plot: Jet's old cop partner calls in a favour to stop a group of convicts on a highjacked transport ship, one of which Jet has a personal vendetta with.

Faye complains to Jet that the shower isn't working properly. Jet couldn't do anything about it. Faye kept nagging till she brought up the subject on how Jet's arm got damaged. But that was none of her business. Then an old partner of Jet's from the I.S.S.P.: Fad, calls him up and asked if he would team up with him for one last time. He's after a runaway ship that has an old enemy of Jet when he was still part of the I.S.S.P. A convict and ex-assassin name Udai Taxim. Who is the main reason why Jet resigned from the I.S.S.P. Jet didn't want to go at first but he wants to in order to get even with his past.—J LeGault
